name: Solo Flight Alpha Version
description:
Hello!

I am currently developing a flight simulation game for release in the near future on Steam with keyboard and controller controls. This is the first alpha version of the game and I am conducting playtesting. I would really appreciate your playing of the game and afterwards completing a quick survey:

https://forms.gle/4gmwwwe6ugaVUEL66

Cheers, Anton

P.S. All participants who playtest and submit the survey will get a free copy of the game when it is released!
